name: Vidacity
description: We bring together startups, businesses and the community to drive innovation and tackle sustainability challenges. Vidacity offers a wide range of programs, services, spaces, partnership and collaboration opportunities to nurture an active and vibrant sustainability and entrepreneurship ecosystem.
